statements: UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET message = 'Follow-up call scheduled' WHERE interaction_id = 101
UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', message = 'Meeting rescheduled' WHERE interaction_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201 AND interaction_type = 'Meeting'
UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET message = 'Follow-up requested', interaction_type = 'Email', interaction_date = '2022-02-20 14:45:00' WHERE customer_id = 202 AND interaction_id = 102
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='Call', interaction_date='2022-11-15', interaction_details='Made a phone call' WHERE interaction_id=1
UPDATE communications SET communication_type='Email', communication_date='2022-11-20', communication_details='Sent an email' WHERE communication_id=2
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Call', interaction_date = '2022-10-01 09:00:00', interaction_details = 'Completed call with customer', customer_id = 123 WHERE interaction_id = 1;

UPDATE communications SET communication_type = 'Email', communication_details = 'Sent marketing email to customer', communication_date = '2022-09-15 15:30:00', customer_id = 456 WHERE communication_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', email_address='johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='Follow-Up', interaction_notes='Scheduled meeting' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Feedback', interaction_notes = 'Excellent service provided' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET notes = 'Follow-up scheduled' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-07-15', interaction_type = 'Follow-up' WHERE interaction_id = 201;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Meeting', interaction_description = 'Discussing new project details' WHERE interaction_id = 123;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com', customer_phone = '9876543210' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_description = 'Updated Interaction Description' WHERE interaction_id = 123
UPDATE call_logs SET call_duration = 30, call_notes = 'Call notes updated' WHERE log_id = 456
